perceptron
Class Perceptron

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      perceptron.Perceptron
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Perceptron
extends javax.swing.JFrame

This is "manager" class of perceptron.

Class Perceptron manages the creation of a fullscreen window, and executes the main drawing loop.

This class contains several publically settable variables. These variables are designed to be automatically configured by the settings file when perceptron starts up, and should not actually be modified while the program is running.

See Also:
Serialized Form
